sentences.english: It discusses the different recognitions to fat liver between TCM and WM .
sentences.chinese: 探讨了现代医学和传统中医对脂肪肝的认识异同。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis and therapy of acute fatty liver of pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨妊娠急性脂肪肝的早期诊断方法和处理原则。

sentences.english: Objective To select the suitable drugs and therapy for steatohepatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的正确选择治疗脂肪肝的药物及疗法。

sentences.english: NAFLD can lead to liver failure.
sentences.chinese: 非酒精性脂肪肝会导致肝功能衰竭。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of XiaoZhiJianGanYin on non-alcohol adiposis hepatica.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨消脂健肝饮治疗非酒精性脂肪肝的作用机制。

sentences.english: Antis-lipid Peroxidation of Zhiganle in Rats with Fatty Liver;
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨中药脂肝宁预防酒精性脂肪肝的作用机理。

sentences.english: So it goes to show that "Hugan dripping pill" is an ideal medicine for treating the AFLD.
sentences.chinese: 是治疗肝郁脾虚夹湿热型酒精性脂肪肝理想药物。

sentences.english: TMG helps the liver metabolize fats, preventing the over accumulation of fats in the liver.
sentences.chinese: 促进肝脏代谢脂肪，防止脂肪肝。

sentences.english: This is one side of our better understanding in recent studies of non-alcoholic fatty liver disease.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们对非酒精性脂肪肝理解更深入的一个方面。

sentences.english: Inhibitory Effect of Aleurites montana on Experimental Atherosclerosis in Quails;
sentences.chinese: 目的观察大黄素对鹌鹑实验性脂肪肝的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse clinical features of nonalcoholic fatty liver.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析非酒精性脂肪肝病的临床特点。

sentences.english: Cockatiels are prone to vitamin-A deficiencies and fatty liver disease.
sentences.chinese: 鸡尾很容易患上维他命A缺乏症与脂肪肝。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of emodin on experimental fatty livers of quails.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察大黄素对鹌鹑实验性脂肪肝的影响。

sentences.english: Depletion of liver HDAC3 causes fatty liver in normal adult mice.
sentences.chinese: 肝HDAC3损耗原因在正常成年鼠脂肪肝。

sentences.english: Betaine hydrochloride is a powerful lipotropic and increases gastric acid.
sentences.chinese: 盐酸甜菜碱是强大的抗脂肪肝物，并可增加胃酸。
